content.raw:
The posterior behavior with sublabels was actually changed in the other open pull request, so if we want the posterior output to be part of the same test, we could work on that one first, I think it's ready for review as well.

It's GMTK 1.0.1, should that go in the readme file?

Edit: [link to other pull request](#!/hoffmanlab/segway/pull-request/8/posterior-compatibility-with-sublabel/diff)
